ygData.subject: Re: work around for no drop items
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry about that guys,  apperently they did fix that last patch.  I tried it again over the weekend to verify.  Ohh well, back to the drawing board.
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry about that guys, apperently they did fix that last patch. I tried it
again over the weekend to verify. Ohh well, back to the drawing board.

>
>
> it has been fixed guys
> i talked to a gm friend after i tried it myself with some cheaper items.
> this trick, posted in digest 164, used to work but verant caught it and
> fixed it. the monsters will accept your gift but you wont find it in their
> loot once you kill them. it was a good idea, im sorry to say it doesnt work.
>
> Telor Strifesage of Karana
>
